p: In obedience to te command of the foregoing writ I have here in court the body Adam Riely and for my return say that said Riley was committed to my custody on the 4th day of August 1853 on warrant issued by Peter W Johnstone a Justice of the Peace within and for the County of St Louis charged with being a Runaway slave on affidavit made by R Dowling which warrant & affidavit are made a part of this return
